input.sentences: i was on vacation last weekend .
i spent most of my time surfing .
i found a huge bird there .
it was a lot of fun .
at night there were a lot of lights on the pier .
output.sentences: My weekend vacation was at the beach.
I found this huge bird staring at me on the beach.
I had a lot of fun that weekend.
The pier at night is so beautiful and peaceful.
